message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. It comes with a comprehensive set of features that cater to your specific needs. Considering its quality and functionality, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $2000000. This is a limited-time opportunity, so please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the high-quality product you're offering. However, my budget allows for a lower price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000 for your product.
